s: Iron Maiden are a legendary heavy metal band from England that has been active since 1975. Known for their intricate guitar work, soaring vocals, and epic song structures, Iron Maiden are widely regarded as one of the most important and influential bands in the history of metal music.

t: Amazon.com: Piece Of Mind[180g LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Iron Maiden's fourth studio album, Piece of Mind, was released in 1983 and reached #14 on the Billboard 200. The certified-platinum release includes the iconic tracks, "The Trooper" and "Flight of Icarus." Available on 180g vinyl.
